name: D Series Off Road Driving Simulation for PC (Canceled)
blurb: D Series is a new Off Road Driving Simulation for PC. I need your help to finish the game and add an online multiplayer racing system.

rewards.reward: - Every pledge counts. Thank you so much. You will receive thanks on our website as a Kickstarter backer.
- Get early access to the Game and One FULL GAME Activation Key for the final game when finished.\r\n- You will receive thanks in the credits of the game on the website as a Kickstarter backer.

- Get early access to the Game and One FULL GAME Activation Key for the final game when finished.\r\n- You will receive thanks in the credits of the game on the website as a Kickstarter backer.\r\n- A custom "Supporter Badge" Avatar logo in the D Series Forums.
